name: PreventiveCareServicesInitialOfficeVisit
title: Preventive Care Services Initial Office Visit
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set indentifies patients over the age of 18 who have had an initial preventive care office visit.),(Data Element Scope: This value set was intended to map to the QDM data type of encounter.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management of an individual over the age of 18.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes non-office visits, including telehealth services.)

concept.display: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management of an individual including an age and gender appropriate history, examination, counseling/anticipatory guidance/risk factor reduction interventions, and the ordering of laboratory/diagnostic procedures, new patient; 18-39 years
